meanings.definition: Present tense form of the verb 'bailar' (to dance) in first person plural.
meanings.sent1: Let's bayamos at the party tonight!
meanings.sent2: We bayamos gracefully to the music.
meanings.sent3: I hope we bayamos like pros and not trip over our own feet!
meanings.sent4: Our synchronized movements on the dance floor bayamos like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The way we bayamos together creates a magical dance routine.

meanings.definition: Present tense form of the verb 'bajar' (to lower) in first person plural.
meanings.sent1: Bayamos the volume so we can hear each other better.
meanings.sent2: We bayamos the flag as a sign of respect.
meanings.sent3: Let's bayamos the elevator and see if it goes faster!
meanings.sent4: The sun begins to set, and we slowly bayamos below the horizon.
meanings.sent5: With a gentle tug, we bayamos the rope down the side of the cliff.
